website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for a high-end Mahjong set will find their match in this quality model.
pros: Fashionable lightweight case with shoulder strap for easy carrying
Case includes an interior zippered pocket
cons: A few customers complained of the tiles being unusually small

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this mahjong set. It is attractive and includes all the pieces such as pushers. The soft case is much lighter than the metal suitcase like case. Everything fits easily into the zippered case. I especially like the trays that hold the tiles have covers included. The price is a less expensive than the hard cased sets.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in a few days. On the day promised.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set in a soft case. I haven’t used it yet, but I opened it up to check all the parts. I love that each component has its own wrapper with a Velcro closure. Extra little bags for your card and instruction book. The paisley case is elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, high quality set and I couldn’t be happier! The quilted carry case is very pretty and well-made. Came with everything described, including extra blanks and jokers, chips and a basic instruction booklet. The racks and tile cases have their own specially sized Velcro closure wraps. I’ve seen one that looks similar but was less expensive. The tiles are lighter in weight and slightly smaller, enough so that the rack holds 20 instead of the required 19. The dice in the less expensive set are also lighter weight. Overall, I’d recommend spending a few extra dollars and get the set you’ll be proud to use for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Lakehouse

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Mah Jongg set! It's carry bag is pretty and just the right size. The tiles are beautiful and the racks are great. I stopped using the plastic containers for the tiles because it took too much time to place them all back in, instead, I found a pretty pouch to hold them all and that easily fits in the carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: MAH JONG SET IS OUTSTANDING  but Outer packaging questionable
customer_reviews.text: CLASS PRODUCT: This Mahjong set has real class -- well thought out design, quality materials and workmanship, easy to use. This applies to the quality carrying bag too. Very well made and attractive, too. The Mahjong set and carrying bag came well-packed in a sealed box. This was in an outer, shipping box SHIPPING: The shipping box looked like a practical, corrugated box. However, IT WAS NOT SEALED. The top side with the shipping stickers was sealed, but the other side had no sealing tape on it at all. The box flaps were just inter-folded , loosely closing the box. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: dhamma7

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set!! I love it! So easy to put back together after using the set. The pushers are great and the tiles are well made. White tiles with beautiful designs etched in the tiles. Dice are good size. If you are going to buy this set the bag is made better than other sets i have seen. Pretty design. Better quality.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Great Mahjong Set!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered the American Mahjong Set by Linda Li and I am very happy with the purchase. The colors printed on the tiles contrast beautifully with the white background and the colors of the racks are pretty and bright. The racks and pushers are one piece and seem sturdy and durable. The quilted case is attractive and lightweight, and the fabric pieces that wrap around the tile boxes and the racks close with velcro keeping all the pieces of the set organized and protected. There is also a small, separate zipper compartment inside the case to store dice and extra tiles. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality set - make Mom Happy
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I got this for my mother for her birthday. She is retired and recently moved to lake of the Osaka and has started learning to play mahjong with a social group there. She asked for a nice set of her own so she could practice and teCh the family to play. She wanted a tote bag version to make them easier to pack up and carry. She absolutely loved this set. She says it’s one of the nicest of all the other players that have them. Glad we sprung for the Linda Li.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Mah Jong
customer_reviews.text: Great set! The white tiles make the lettering standout. The components stack and store easily in the duffel. I have received many compliments on all aspects of this affordable set.
customer_reviews.author: L. Q.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Sturdy Mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set -- the quilted case and rack and tile holders are similar in quality and style to Vera Bradley items. I wanted a set that was lighter than the hard case sets, and this is perfect. The racks are sturdy, the tiles are colorful and include both types of flower tiles. There are extra jokers and some blank tiles. as well as dice and chips. The sturdy straps on the case make it easy to carry. I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Manning

customer_reviews.title: New! - American Mahjong Set by Linda Li8482 5 stars plus
customer_reviews.text: I bought New American Mahjong Set It has beautiful tiles, the rack/pusher is something I've been playing with on others' sets and love. Plenty of extra tiles, in case of loss, has everything you could need and more. I will say that everything was perfect, except one of the rack/pushers. It was cracked. I wrote the company, and they responded right away and sent me a replacement. WONDERFUL CO. It also comes not only with the covered boxes to keep the tiles in, it also has matching zippered bags! I find that much easier and takes less time. Beautiful Carry bag and covers for the racks. I recommend this set and the honest company.
customer_reviews.author: JILL KOZAK

customer_reviews.title: You Can Learn Mahjong!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ahead of schedule, everything as advertised. I am a new player to American style Mahjong and the booklet that came with the set was really helpful to my getting started learning the “hands” that could can be made. No dice, but I had some. Joined a Meet-Up group of very nice folks who play during the week. My schedule allows me to attend once a week for a very relaxing four-hour stretch of time. Thank you for the good service.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful American Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set! The bag is very roomy and holds everything with extra space. Note: This does not come with cards, you have to purchase those separately. I didn't know this so I thought I would pass on the information.
customer_reviews.author: Pixi Queen

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this set and has met my expectations of buying online. The tiles are very clear to read and of high quality as well as the bag that the items fit in. The rack holders are made of plastic so I hope they hold up throughout the years. Am excited to use this set to play next week with my friends.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. I was very happy to see the two bags included. I use those to store the tiles. I find the trays a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: NSimmons

customer_reviews.title: Costs a bit more than other sets but the case is very nice and in my opinion worth the extra.
customer_reviews.text: Like the carrying case and the fact that there is room for additional items than the set. Use of the attached pushers does require some practice. Tiles are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JRW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, well made with a great tote!
customer_reviews.text: My Mahjong group LOVES this set! The pushers are nice and smooth, the tiles are bright and best of all are the zip around bags for the tiles! The carry all tote has plenty of room to store a light table cloth or extras! The set was shipped with bubble wrap around the pushers and packed with care! I highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Mo in So Fl

customer_reviews.title: This set is perfect. It is light weight
customer_reviews.text: I have mobility issues and need to have my hands free. This set is perfect. It is light weight, and I can put it over my shoulder so my hands are free! Everyone in my Mah Jong group compliments me and asks me where I got it. I have only one suggestion. It would be nice to have a pocket, either inside or on the outside to hold the cards and instructions so they are not wrinkled in the bag as I put the tiles and racks in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: improvements tNeeded o the Mah Jong set
customer_reviews.text: The rack and tile covers should be a bit longer which means the bag would have to be a bit bigger too and the rack cover should be closed at one end with ease of sliding the racks in. It is very difficult to get the racks into the bag. Also the racks do not have the pegs for betting. The pocket to keep the extra tiles is OK but not big enough to hold the card nor the booklet that cane with the game. Maybe a pocket should be inserted for them. The tile cases are good but the lids are a cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fun
customer_reviews.text: The set is great....lovely, complete and so handy to carry in the beautiful bag.
customer_reviews.author: kaycocco1

customer_reviews.title: Love my new mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: Love my new mahjong set. Best part about it are the 2 tile bags and the roomy carrying case. Was a bit skeptical in ordering because a few reviews said that the tile racks were a tight fit Into the bag.. NOT the case at all. Everything fits perfectly in the bag. Highly recommend this set for personal use or as a beautiful gift. Now, all i have to do is win!!! 🙏
customer_reviews.author: LYNN K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this set. Soft bag makes it lighter than a hard case. Pretty pattern. Love the long strap so you can carry over your shoulder. Lots of room & pockets Very clean, easy to read tiles. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L

customer_reviews.title: beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set in a lovely quilted case. Makes it easy to transport to someone else's house.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Laubach

customer_reviews.title: way too expensive for its poor design
customer_reviews.text: The storage is poorly designed. A bunch of bags w/o usage instruction. The picture shown in the user manual isn't consistent with the product. Other similar products on Amazon are half of its price, yet with much better storage design. I am going to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tiles and carrying bag.
customer_reviews.text: My wife plays and hosts Mahjong parties so I ordered this set for Christmas. It has exceeded her expectations with the quality of the tiles and beautiful bag it came in. The symbols on the tiles were very clear and the white background set them up perfectly. Her playing partners loved the feel of the tiles with just the right weight and thickness. The price was low compared to the product quality.
customer_reviews.author: lrtyler

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to MahJongg and love this set. The tiles are a good size, colorful and easy to read and store in boxes with lids then wrap into a quilted cover. The pushers are also separately wrapped. There is a side pocket inside for your cards, dice and tokens. This pretty quilted bag is easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: rldancer

customer_reviews.title: Mah Jong set
customer_reviews.text: Love the new Mah Jong set. The case is beautiful and makes carrying the game from house to house easy. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mary j barnett

customer_reviews.title: Pretty case- holds everything
customer_reviews.text: Pretty case- holds everything. I would give it 5 stars, BUT- the plastic covers that go over the tile trays are pretty flimsy. I feel like they will not hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Zuendt

customer_reviews.title: Great set manual not so good
customer_reviews.text: It’s contained everything we needed but I also got the book the begginers guide which provided better understanding of the game compared to their information
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: This set with bag and accessories is great!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to Mahjong, so I like that one side is blank. The tiles are easy to read. The bag and all the accessories are very useful. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Great set but mine came broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom as a gift, she loves it except a couple of the pushers were broken, rather than send it back I just bought a cheap set of pushers to substitute, otherwise it is very nice she says.
customer_reviews.author: mocha

customer_reviews.title: I love this mahjongg set!
customer_reviews.text: The tiles are easy to read and sleek. I like the racks with the built in pushers. The storage bags for the tiles are beautiful and easy to pack and unpack. The storage for the racks/pushers is a padded/Velcro wrap that is more difficult to repack. It is, however, better than just throwing the racks in the soft carry bag with no protection. The soft case for the entire set is padded and matches the other storage cases. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Very pleased with features. Easy to carry to other locations and put up after using. Has a stop for the correct # of tiles to set up your wall. Bag is sturdy and has great easy wrap covers for tile holders and racks.
customer_reviews.author: PLyle

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Set Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy stylish quilted carrying case with sturdy straps. Zippered inner pocket and Velcro wraps for racks and tiles . Additional two zippered fabric bags. All in one plastic racks & pushers. Extra blank tiles, jokers, & flowers. I'm very pleased with this American Mahjong set. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Love this Mahjong set.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Mahjong set. The carrying case is made of a pleasing quilted pattern. The set contains everything needed to play the game. It was a little more expensive than other sets, but worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Debby66

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My Mahjong game arrived very quickly. All the pieces are in good order. The bag is quolted so it is lighter than some of the metal boxes I've see others have. While the plastic containers that the tiles are stored in are light to carry, I would have preferred them to be made out out of a heavier firmer plastic with a hinged or snap lid. All on all a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. Love the bag and tiles are really nice. Will enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Mahjang renews interest in a game played for over two thousand years.
customer_reviews.text: The Mahjong set by Li arrived on time. The materials are strong and colorful. The directions are clear and liken Mahjong to Rummy or Bridge type games. Mahjang can include three to four players. It is far more involved than the internet version of Mahjong.
customer_reviews.author: barra

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: The description and all the pieces were perfect. This is a gift so I haven't played with this set before. Looks terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Beautifully made and packed! Cant wait to use. So happy i finally decided to get this. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ANNA MARIE STEINES

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Mah jongg set
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this set for several years now. It has been used weekly and still looks new. The racks have held up well. The carrying bag is still in great shape - no tears, zipper still perfect. Several of my fellow Mah jongg enthusiasts have purchased the same set and are equally happy as well. Nice looking, easy to carry. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: VERY ATTRACTIVE, EASY TO CARRY
customer_reviews.text: i LIKE THE FACT THAT YOU CAN PUT YOUR TILES IN THE 2 POUCHES GIVEN INSTEAD OF LINING THEM UP IN THE TRAYS. VERY EASY TO SET UP AND PUT AWAY. I LOVE THE BLUE AND WHITE CARRIER..IT IT SO EASY TO CARRY.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Heller

customer_reviews.title: A quality item
customer_reviews.text: The carrying bag and the matching holders for the parts is well made and stylish. All the tiles are also well made and of high quality. This was a gift and the recipient was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg H Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Tiles are very easy to read and everything fits in sturdy bag making it easy to bring anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother got this for herself for Christmas because she plays Mahjong with all her friends in her retirement community and everyone is in awe over it. My grandmother LOVES her set so much.
customer_reviews.author: David R Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: popular set, happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: perfect set. lightweight. Mom requested this particular set, after seeing others with it, and loves it. has held up well, one year later. recommended. universal appeal of pattern
customer_reviews.author: L Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Blue & White Carying Case is lightweight and looks smart!
customer_reviews.text: This set met all my expections except the tiles were a little smaller than those of my friends I was used to playing. However we got used to the size and actually liked it after we played with them awhile. The tiles are nice and clear. The rack/pusher does not have a place on which to hang the coins. I'm wondering if there is a coin square or rack sold separately? I love the soft blue & white carying case. I like that the pushers are attached and swing out easily.
customer_reviews.author: SallyB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set. So easy to put everything back into the individual wraps, and then into the tote. Extra jokers, and flowers, plus blank tiles. After one of my Mah Jongg friends saw my set, she immediately ordered one for herself.
customer_reviews.author: BQ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mahjong Tiles in a perfect pack
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! Love the tiles and the plastic holders. Everything fits perfectly love this set!
customer_reviews.author: rcanw

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I love the mahjong set! It comes in a very pretty bag which is so much nicer than the others I have seen. All the parts are there and the instruction book is a good guide for a beginner or a good reminder for the intermediate!
customer_reviews.author: Merry

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The mah Jpngg set is beautiful; . I used it for the first time on Wednesday. Several others commented on it and one person had one just like it. We will have to mark it some way to keep us straight.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the set. The fabric is sturdy and attractive. The pushers are good quality. They are standard size tiles. I would prefer larger, but the set is very nice. Played our first game with it a last week and everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.author: pam warnock

customer_reviews.title: A Wonderful Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I ordered this particular set. From the carrying case to the tiles it is superior to others I’ve played with. The case is very sturdy, the pushers work perfectly & aren’t tight or stiff. The tiles appear a little heavier than some which is very nice. Others have also commented on it’s great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Beautiful bags. I think it's much nicer looking than the hard cases. even my friends that have the hard cases are inn awe of mine.
customer_reviews.author: princess

customer_reviews.title: I'm hooked on mah jongg!
customer_reviews.text: The carrying bag with tile and rack sleeves keep the game nice and tidy for mobile players. As full-time RVers we need to consider tidy organization and convenient mobility of games. The set always gains attention when we meet friends at the Activity Center for a couple games. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: I love it.  Trying to learn Mahjong
customer_reviews.text: The Package arrived with the green pusher broken. I did get an email from you saying that you would replace it????
customer_reviews.author: Susan Burdett

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set.plenty of room in case and light weight. Everyone wanted to know where I got it. It looks like a vera bradley bag
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set...love the bag!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to American Mahjong and was looking for a set for myself. Love this as I was in love with the bag, and have already monogrammed it! Have used it and everyone loved it! Great set up and bag. The tiles are just as described and quality all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Beemergirl

customer_reviews.title: Just As Promised
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Good quality. Love the bag, plenty of room to store everything and lighter, more convenient than the cases.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Geller

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Several of my friends have this set and I liked it so it’s the one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Kathyb

customer_reviews.title: Shipped as advertised.  Love the carrying tote and other protective bags.
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this Mah Jong set is very nice except perhaps the racks and pushers. For the price of the set, I expected a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: LindiaW Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made set and portable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Mahjong set. I thought tiles were ivory colored, but they are white. Not a deal breaker, but something to be aware of. I don't know why sets don't include a way to indicate who is E-S-W-N. It would help. Overall good set.
customer_reviews.author: sb12

customer_reviews.title: The tiles are white and easy to see the markings
customer_reviews.text: I love the set it’s packed extremely well the tiles are beautiful it’s easy to take out and put back in the case it’s worth the money if you want a good set
customer_reviews.author: minda riente james

customer_reviews.title: Linda Li Mah Jongg set
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a Mah Jongg enthusiast, and she loves it. Delivery was quick, and was well-packaged ... no problems.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Wood Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good Mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Mahjong set. I love that the pushers are attached to the racks and the fabric case is pretty and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Bracall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality set
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous bag and accessory holders in this set. I also prefer the white tiles. I get compliments all the time! Very compact set and everything inside stays put unlike some other tote bags! If quality is important to you, you will love this set!
customer_reviews.author: JPG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set. Easy to transport and plenty of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Garfan

customer_reviews.title: Great and pretty set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Easy to carry and protects everything. It includes everything you need to play except the national Mah jong card and other players
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Sladek

customer_reviews.title: Mah Jongg set
customer_reviews.text: The set was exactly as presented. I love it. Plan to take it on a 17 day cruise. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great value  and well made
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this set! I have two sets plus bought one for a neighbor. Even comes with several extra pouches that you can store the tiles in.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Mahjong Style
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife.....it is quality product and quite attractive. She took it to her Mahjong Club and everyone liked the tiles, and the well designed case.
customer_reviews.author: MKOhio

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable mahjong set
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if there was a different way to store the tiles other than in the trays provided.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hulbert

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT MAHJONG SET
customer_reviews.text: I would surely recommend this set. I love the WHITE tiles and the carrying case the best. Can't wait to use it with my group. Everything is included and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: GLORIA

customer_reviews.title: Sort of satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It didn't meet my expectations as the set is the small tile set. I wanted the larger size but when ordering it does not specify the size.
customer_reviews.author: Kiko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife plays every week and all of them really like this set. Heavy!!
customer_reviews.author: RhysKrispies

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy tops of trays
customer_reviews.text: The tops of the Plastic trays that hold the tiles are flimsy. The product stated sturdy, but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: NancyL

customer_reviews.title: Have recommended to several friends
customer_reviews.text: My mahjongg group is growing and needed a extra set. Love the color, weight and size of tiles. The tote bag is great for storage and makes it easy to take to a friend’s house to play.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Tannen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price for a Mahjongg game that feels like good quality. Some pushers can feel cheap and break easily. These feel sturdy. Would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Osprey

customer_reviews.title: The quality.
customer_reviews.text: The set was delivered in two days. It came faster than I thought. I really like the quilted carry case and the way the tiles and racks were also in the quilted cases. I would recommend this set highly.
customer_reviews.author: jackharvey, jr.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive washable carry case
customer_reviews.text: Attractive carry case. Two cases inside close with velcro and hold racks and tiles. Zipper pocket organizes included chips and die.
customer_reviews.author: C-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: It is so much easier to carry, especially for older people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, complete set !
customer_reviews.text: Just learning to play ... and wanted a Mahjong set to be able to practice. This set is perfect !
customer_reviews.author: dallasdaisy

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The construction of this bag is excellent and I am very excited to show up to my Mahjong club with my new set! The tiles are exactly what I wanted as are the racks.
customer_reviews.author: aacgalhere

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well designed
customer_reviews.text: I like the appearance, feel, and quality of workmanship. No dislikes at all.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas N. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set
customer_reviews.text: This set is easy to carry, the tiles are of very good quality, and the bag is a beautiful pattern. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Murphy

customer_reviews.title: The zipper is double sided so very easy to get tiles in and out
customer_reviews.text: Full size tiles in attractive carry tote. The zipper is double sided so very easy to get tiles in and out. Fast, prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: ECR47

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!,
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set...well made..exceeded my expectations. Beautiful carrying bag with holders for tiles and rack and pushers and two additional bags...very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Janis

customer_reviews.title: Tiles too small.
customer_reviews.text: Tiles too small compared to what i am used to. I sent it back for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Sandman

customer_reviews.title: mahjong Set
customer_reviews.text: I just started learning how to play mahjong. The set is just beautiful with every thing you need to set up a game.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift for my Mom and she loved the set
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my Mom and she loved the set. Not too heavy. I purchased another set in a hard case that I returned because it was too heavy for her.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying Mahjong again!
customer_reviews.text: My mother showed us how to play this wonderful game when we were kids... So glad I finally get to teach my son how to play!
customer_reviews.author: Marie L.

customer_reviews.title: IMPUT OF THE CONSUMER IS INVALUABLE.
customer_reviews.text: My friends I play Mah Jongg with all seem to have bags for their tiles. I have an inclination to agree with them; versus the rectangular plastic boxes the tiles come in. My arrival time for the set took the maximum time given upon my ordering. I greatly appreciate your interest in my review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: New! - American Mahjong Set by Linda Li8482; - 166 Premium White Tiles, 4 All-in-One Rack/Pushers, Blue Paisley Soft Bag – Classic Full Size Complete Mahjongg Set
product_meta.description:
This stylish, high-quality American Mah Jongg set from Linda Li comes fully equipped in a gorgeous soft-sided carrying case with elegant quilted design and luxurious blue paisley print.

The soft-sided bag is ultra lightweight, sporting a nifty two-way zipper for easy open and close functionality, a convenient inside zippered pocket, as well as 2 sturdy shoulder straps making it very convenient to carry around.

The set contains 166 premium white colored tiles, all fully engraved, and beautifully hand-painted. Made of melamine, they are heavy and scratch-resistant. These are the most beautiful Bams and Dots you will find.

The tiles break down as follows:

36 Dots, 36 Bams, 36 Cracks, 12 Dragons, 16 Winds, 16 Flowers, 10 Jokers, and 4 Blank Spares. Tiles measure 1-3/16" tall x 7/8" wide x 1/2" thick (30mm x23mm x13mm)

The 2 tile trays hold 80 tiles each, and there are 6 spare tiles included (2 Jokers, 4 Blanks). Each tile tray comes with a clear plastic lid to keep your tiles securely in the trays during transport. The tile trays are further secured by a matching quilted wrapper with strap closures.

The new all-in-one pusher and tile rack are a breeze to use and very easy to put away after game play. A second matching quilted wrapper keeps your all-in-one pushers organized and protected while packed away.

Also included: "Mah Jongg Primer, American Style" by Michele Frizzell, complete with 3D color graphics to help you master the game or brush up on rules and strategy.

All of the above, for under $120!
feature_bullets: Beautiful, lightweight, and stylish soft sided quilted case from Linda Li™, with convenient shoulder straps and handy inside zippered pocket!
Tiles are white color, fully engraved, beautifully hand-painted, and made of durable melamine
166 premium tiles: 36 Dots, 36 Bams, 36 Cracks, 12 Dragons, 16 Winds, 16 Flowers, 10 Jokers, and 4 Blank Spares, each tile measuring 1-3/16" tall x 7/8" wide x 1/2" thick (30mm x 23mm x 13mm)

Includes 4 all-in-one pusher and tile rack combo, so easy to use and so easy to put away after game play. Each set comes with 3 large dice (5/8" size), 100 money chips, and bettor (please check inside zippered pocket for these accessories)
Also included: "Mah Jongg Primer, American Style" by Michele Frizzell, complete with 3D color graphics to help you master the game or brush up on rules and strategy. All for under $120!
